Hello! I'm *DarkBox*, your personal assistant. I'm here to help you with your queries. If you need anything, feel free to ask me.
In addition to helping with any queries, here are the functions I have available:
ðŸ“Œ I can create as many stickers as you want, just send me an image or a short video of no more than 10 seconds and then reply with the word 'sticker'
ðŸ“Œ If you don't know the name of a song, just record about 5 seconds of it, send it to me, and then reply to that audio with the word 'shazam', and I'll find the name of that song for you.
ðŸ“Œ I can create images from text or an idea. You can tell me 'create' and an idea you have, and I'll try to draw it for you.
Example: create a rainy evening by the beach
ðŸ“Œ If you type the word 'status' you can see your profile information in the bot.
